feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Analytics Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP Analytics Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to format Amount property in table widget?
entry.content:
Hello experts,

My dimension Contract has property Contract Amount, type Decimal.

I need to show this property in a story table.

However, amounts in this property look as text, not like number/amount.

Is it possible to format a property so that it looks like amount?

Best regards,

Oleksandr

entry.title: Joule integration in SAC
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am looking for some information, blogs, details, guides about the integration between Joule and SAP Analytics Cloud 

The integration seems not available as per SAP official documentation: https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_ANALYTICS_CLOUD/00f68c2e08b941f081002fd3691d86a7/06e77430ae0846afba012862e031983d.html?locale=en-US

But in parallel, still an official SAP page show a video where Joule is available in SAC: https://www.sap.com/assetdetail/2024/02/60905bd1-a97e-0010-bca6-c68f7e60039b.html

I really do not understand if this funcionality is available, if it is not and, if it is, how can I activate Joule in SAP Analytics Cloud ?

Anyona has any idea?

 

Thanks for the support.

Samuele

entry.title: Avoid rerunning upon Edit Query or Import Settings for Actuals import from BW
entry.content:
Hi,

I importing Actuals from SAP BW for my SAC Forecast Model. The main bottleneck is time taken to edit the query or update Import Settings of the Import job for Actuals from SAP BW.

Data retrieved by this query is <2M and it takes around 40 mins to complete. I'm fine with time taken while refreshing the data but if I want to edit or just view the query, it shows rerunning the query and takes almost same time as if it is refreshing the whole dataset. Same in case of opening the Import Settings. Though preview shows only 2000 records it takes same amount of time.

Is there any other way to avoid rerunning the whole query (to avoid delay) while performing these two operations? I would like to be able to quickly view/edit query or import settings without waiting that long.

Thanks!

Raj

entry.title: CORS Policy in SAC with live connection to BW
entry.content:
Hello!

We have been running SAC dashboards from our CRM system via an URL that is inserted in the CRM system.

Last week we had a security update on our network and now this is not working anymore. No changes have been made in BW or SAC!

We have a live BW connection with SAML to our SAC system and we have no problems running stories directly in SAC, it is when we call the stories from our CRM system we get the problem.

We get to SAC but when SAC calls BW we get the following error:

Access to XMLHttpRequest at 'https://lspappbw01.itpap.local:44300/sap/bw/ina/GetServerInfo?sap-client=010' from origin 'https://papyrus-1.eu10.hcs.cloud.sap' has been blocked by CORS policy: Permission was denied for this request to access the `unknown` address space.

Running the same URL directly in edge works fine and also in SAC.

Can you advice what to do?

 

/Maria

entry.title: Warning in Calendar (Data Locking Task)
entry.content:
Hi team,
I have a problem. I am creating a process and generating events using the wizard. The issue is that when I create the process with a certain driving dimension and add a Data Locking Task, everything runs normally — but once all tasks are completed, the Data Locking Task shows the following warning:

The member in question is part of the driving dimension, so it doesn’t make sense why this isn’t working.

Do you know how to solve this issue?

Thanks in Advance,

Ganjos

entry.title: change Loginname in SAC
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have configured SSO with IAS in SAC. When a user logs in  via SSO, they are welcomed with a P-number (e.g., "Hello P00001!") in SAC.

How can I change this so that the user is greeted by their first or last name (e.g., "Hello Max!" instead P-Number ?

Thanks in advance for your help!!!

Best regards

entry.title: Error importing data
entry.content:
Hi team, 

So I have a problem. I am an Admin user in SAC, so I can import the data (from Datasphere) without any issues. The problem occurs when I switch to the end-user account, which has the Planner Reporter role, Viewer role, and BI Content Viewer role. In this account, I can’t import the data in a Multi-Action that contains a Data Import step. The error was:

Do you know the issue?

Thanks in Advance,
Ganjos

entry.title: SAC Import job fails in first step (gather data)
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We are building a new SAP Analytics Cloud for planning solution and have an import job that has previously run without issues for weeks. We are extracting data from an S/4HANA on prem system (QA environment) to an SAC Dev tenant, so nothing is productive at this point. Suddenly the job started failing in the first step  (or couldn't be created, if we tried to create a new and identical import job). We are using oData service UI_FINS_GLACCOUNTFLOW to fetch data from the GLAccountBalanceFlow view.

After playing around with fields and filters in the job, it has been established that the Profit center and Cost center fields are causing the job to fail. If these fields are omitted, the job completes successfully. However, these fields are critical for the solution.

The error messages in SAC are many but fairly bland and there are no entries in the SAC monitor (trace).

The problem is not caused by missing authorizations, as even if the SAC user gets SAP_ALL in S4, the job still fails. Does anyone have any suggestions on what to investigate next in order to identify the root cause? As I said, the job ran fine for weeks and the suddenly started to fail.

Also, running the job importing data from S/4 DEV environment runs without issues, so the issue appears when trying to import from  S/4 QA.

I appreciate any inputs.

Thanks

entry.title: When I add new dimension member at story level, will it be added in the model as well?
entry.content: While Preparing income statement by product I encounter the following doubt. There is a new product that is planned for the forecast, but it hasn't been created yet, so I used the Add Member feature in the story to input plan values for the new product and published it. Is the member I added in the table is saved/added in the planning model also?

entry.title: YEAR data in RESULTLOOKUP
entry.content:
Hi,

I am using CY+1 in Memberset in my advanced formula. Now, I want to refer to the CY data in RESULTLOOKUP to go in DATA function. The issue is resultlookup picking up the 202501 data and posting to DATA function, I want the whole 2025 data which it is not allowing me to do.

Can anyone help here

Thanks.

entry.title: Year in Resultlookup
entry.content:
Hi,

I am using CY+1 in date filter in MEMBERSET function. Now, I want to bring CY data in date filter in RESULTLOOKUP but it is not allowing me to do. I cannot make date filter to be of single cardinality.

Let me know how to bring whole year in RESULTLOOKUP.

Thanks

entry.title: SAC BW Live: How to Replace “#” (Not Assigned) with Text Like “Missing” Without BW Changes?
entry.content: I am using SAP Analytics Cloud with a BW Live connection.My BW query Q1 joins Q2 and Q3, and Q3 does not contain some dimension members, so SAC shows “#” for those records. This is technically correct, but business users want to see a text like “Missing” instead of “#”.I do not want to change anything in BW queries or master data.Is it possible to replace or map “#” to custom text in SAC for display purposes only? If not, what is the recommended SAC-side workaround?

entry.title: Flexible Time Selection in SAP Analytics Cloud
entry.content: Is it possible in SAP Analytics Cloud to allow users to select either the current fiscal year or rolling 12 months and also set a From and To range using a date filter in a story?

entry.title: Publication of different bookmarked views in a story in SAP Analytics Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts, I am trying to use the publication function in SAP Analytics Cloud.

I have a story using several filters like MTD/YTD + Actual/Budget. And I would like to bookmark MTD+Actual/MTD+Budget/YTD+Actual/YTD+Budget as different views and send them to different recipients.

However, it seems that the four views are separated into four files and thus four emails by SAC. I am wondering whether there is a way to consolidate the four views into one file, or four files in one email.

Thank you in advance!

SAP Analytics Cloud, connectivity

entry.title: Disable Open story button for SendNotification API in SAC.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We want to use SendNotification API in SAC to send notification on button click. But we want to disable Open Story button or URL that comes at the bottom of mail. Check attached screenshot for reference. 

Is there a way to disable this button?

entry.title: Mapping multiple employee ID columns to Employee Names for SF model
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m working on a model in SAC using data from SAP SuccessFactors (WFRequest) via an SF Query.

In the dataset, I have several dimensions that store Employee IDs, such as: (CreatedBy, LastModifiedBy and a few others)

These fields only display the Employee ID, but what I really need is to show the employee name.

I already have a public dimension with employee details (ID, name, etc.). The problem is that this public dimension can only be linked to one of these dimensions . Once it’s used, I can’t reuse it for the other Employee ID fields in the same model.

Any tips or ideas would be really helpful.
Thanks in advance!

entry.title: CAN WE CONVERT STRING TO DATE USING DATA ACTIONS
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a requirement for calculating XIRR within SAC using Data Actions.
When I used year granularity the calculation did work for IRR part. But now, i need to calculate XIRR which needs day granularity. Before converting it to day granularity I want to try with fiscal period with data type as string. but when scoping i was getting error that date parameters cannot accept string, now i want to convert it to date.
How can i achieve it.
Appreciate your help!
Thanks.

entry.title: Can monthly model imports be automated using an Excel file as the data source?
entry.content:
Greetings Community!

I’m looking to automate monthly model imports using an Excel file as the data source. I’d like to know if this is feasible, what the recommended approach is, and any best practices or pitfalls to watch out for.

Goal

  • Schedule a recurring monthly import job that consumes data from a .xlsx file.
  • Ensure the process is reliable, scalable, and low maintenance (ideally no manual intervention beyond updating the Excel file).

Thanks for any insights!

Andrew

entry.title: SAC SSO: Merging existing users without losing content
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

we have IAS configured as a proxy. Users are provisioned from a custom IdP to IAS and then created dynamically in SAC (attribute = User ID) via SSO .

In SAC, there are already manually created users with existing content.
The SSO users and the manually created users in SAC have different User IDs, which is historical.

Our goal is to switch fully to SSO and replace or merge the existing SAC users without losing user content (stories, private objects, settings).

Currently, we face the following issues:

  • SAC does not allow duplicate email addresses when a new SSO user is created (different User ID, but same email address).

  • When we assign roles manually in SAC to an SSO user, they are removed at the next login.

Our questions:

  • What is the recommended approach to dynamically create SSO users in SAC and transfer or replace existing content from the old user to the new SSO user?

  • Is there a simple or supported way to migrate or merge existing SAC users with the new SSO users?

  • How are Owner property handled when SSO is activated, and what should be considered to avoid issues with access or content ownership?

Thank you very much for your help and experience.

Best regards

entry.title: Measure Filtering in SAC with BW Live Data
entry.content: I am using an SAP Analytics Cloud analytic model with BW Live data. Is it possible to filter only one measure like a dimension filter without using BW variables. Is this possible only with value range filtering or also by selecting each unique value.
